A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]] ''' was released on '''January 12, 2010''', at 8:26 UTC<ref name="release">{{tweet|notch|7662650266|Tweaked some indev security. Minecraft has the best community ever! Thx. :)|January 12, 2010, 8:26 UTC}}</ref>

== Technical ==
'''General'''
* A proxy is now required to start the game.<ref name="release" />
** This was to prevent it from being hosted on other sites.
